item.title: PicoCTF 2019 Writeup: Forensics
item.description: Glory of the Garden Problem This garden contains more than it seems. You can also find the file in /problems/glory-of-the-garden_5_eeb712a9a3bc1998ffcd626af9d63f98 on the shell server. file Solution There’s addition text in the file that can be extracted with strings. $ strings garden.jpg | grep pico Here is a flag "picoCTF{more_than_m33ts_the_3y3cD8bA96C}" flag: picoCTF{more_than_m33ts_the_3y3cD8bA96C} unzip Problem Can you unzip this file and get the flag? file Solution just unzip the file to get flag.

item.title: PicoCTF 2018 Writeup: Forensics
item.description: Forensics Warmup 1 Problem Can you unzip this file for me and retreive the flag? Solution Just unzip the file. flag: picoCTF{welcome_to_forensics} Forensics Warmup 2 Problem Hmm for some reason I can’t open this PNG? Any ideas? Solution Using the file command, you can see that the image is, in fact, in jpeg format not png: ‚ùØ file flag.png flag.png: JPEG image data, JFIF standard 1.01 Open the image as a jpeg file to get the file.
